issue.title: INTEGRATION_gripper test failure on os x 10.9.2 if gripper has no gravity

content.raw:
I downloaded your model.sdf and ran the test, and it did fail for me. I noticed, however, that your model.sdf file had some additional changes beyond adding the gravity tags:
~~~
diff -r 8caa96e73ea3 simple_gripper/model.sdf
--- a/simple_gripper/model.sdf	Fri May 02 12:28:40 2014 -0700
+++ b/simple_gripper/model.sdf	Mon May 19 15:15:10 2014 -0700
@@ -253,9 +261,9 @@
     </joint>
     <gripper name="simple_gripper">
       <grasp_check>
-        <detach_steps>40</detach_steps>
-        <attach_steps>20</attach_steps>
-        <min_contact_count>2</min_contact_count>
+        <detach_steps>40000</detach_steps>
+        <attach_steps>1</attach_steps>
+        <min_contact_count>1</min_contact_count>
       </grasp_check>
       <gripper_link>right_finger</gripper_link>
       <gripper_link>right_finger_tip</gripper_link>
~~~
The test passes for me, without these changes, ie. using the following version of simple_gripper that I uploaded to gazebo_models:

[modified model.sdf that passes test for me](#!/osrf/gazebo_models/src/5bb13de228b978db490eef57d1734ef876411930/simple_gripper/model.sdf)

[commit of that model.sdf showing the diff](#!/osrf/gazebo_models/commits/5bb13de228b978db490eef57d1734ef876411930)

I downloaded your model.sdf and ran the test, and it did fail for me. I noticed, however, that your model.sdf file had some additional changes beyond adding the gravity tags:

diff -r 8caa96e73ea3 simple_gripper/model.sdf
--- a/simple_gripper/model.sdf  Fri May 02 12:28:40 2014 -0700
+++ b/simple_gripper/model.sdf  Mon May 19 15:15:10 2014 -0700

     </joint>
     <gripper name="simple_gripper">
       <grasp_check>
-        <detach_steps>40</detach_steps>
-        <attach_steps>20</attach_steps>
-        <min_contact_count>2</min_contact_count>
+        <detach_steps>40000</detach_steps>
+        <attach_steps>1</attach_steps>
+        <min_contact_count>1</min_contact_count>
       </grasp_check>
       <gripper_link>right_finger</gripper_link>
       <gripper_link>right_finger_tip</gripper_link>

The test passes for me, without these changes, ie. using the following version of simple_gripper that I uploaded to gazebo_models:
